Please fill out one of the templates on https://github.com/tongueroo/jets/issues/new/choose

If you want to ask a question please do so on the Jets Community forum: https://community.boltops.com

To be sensitive to everyone's time, we may close issues asking questions without comment. Posting your questions in the Jets community forum is the best place. It also benefits others by making the questions easier to find. Here are some additional options also http://rubyonjets.com/docs/support/ ðŸ‘Œ

Thank you!
